#summary How to obtain and compile the latest DSlash source code.

=Building DSlash from Source=

==What you need==
  * Linux. DSlash is not currently tested on other platforms.
  * A subversion client. These instructions assume svn.
  * A C compiler. These instructions assume gcc.

== Steps ==
  # Check out the latest DSlash: `svn checkout http://dslash.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ dslash-read-only`^1^
  # Enter the source directory: `cd dslash-read-only`
  # Compile: `make`
  # Show Help: `./dslash -h`
  # Trim a ROM file: `./dslash infile.nds outfile.nds`

===Notes===
1. If you've already checked out DSlash, use `svn update http://dslash.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ dslash-read-only` (issued from the same location where you checked out) instead
